#summary Installation instruction for DM_AdminPlugin2

= Download =
  * Download the latest compiled version at http://code.google.com/p/dm-adminplugin/downloads/list OR
  * Checkout the latest revision and compile it yourself (It is built under .Net 3.5 using Visual Studio 2008)

= Installation =
  # Download the latest dedicated build from http://alteriw.net/dedicate if you haven't already.
  # Place the plugin DLL into MW2Root\plugins\
  # Place the rest of the plugin(admin.dat, message files) into MW2Root\plugins\dm_admin\ (You can change this directory later)
